QuestData.Title: Trapped Tauren
QuestData.Description:
The drogbar just rounded up those of us that they could and led them to a cave near here.
If you act quickly, I think they can still be saved. I know not what purpose they have for capturing our people.
I shudder to think of it... in the deep places, the darkness rules.
QuestData.CompletionText: They slew many of my brothers and sisters, but at least some managed to escape. Others, however, we captured.
QuestData.RewardText: They have returned relatively unharmed. Thank you, $n.
